Package chesspieces

Class Queen

java.lang.Object
chesspieces.ChessPiece
chesspieces.Queen
public class Queen extends ChessPiece
The Queen class represents a Queen piece in a chess game
Author:
Eric Zhang, Stanley Cai

      row - - starting row index for the Queen

      team - - what team (black or white)
